full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)

#### Tender Information

* **Contract Route ID**: WS4234139296
* **Tender Number**: W3721-24-SL03
* **French Name**: Services de maintien, côtes douce

#### Contract Details

* **Publication Date**: November 1, 2023
* **Closing Date**: December 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Modified Date**: December 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: *SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Type**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

#### Contract Specifications

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio for the Department of National Defence (DND). The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Tender Documents

Tender documentation can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery webpage: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17889054

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Christine Seguin, SPAC/PSPC
* **Email**: [christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not available
* **Fax**: Not available
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

#### Teleconférence

A teleconférence will be held on November 14, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in English and on November 15, 2023, at 1:00 PM EST in French to discuss the requirements of this contract. Please confirm your attendance by November 8, 2023.
